Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Campbell "Campiekid"
Reviews.Content: Terrible audio reproduction, the pics are blurry (at first they were ok,for the first 250 pics or so)Junk in my opinion red eye on 90% of my pics dont be fooled by the 3x and the 7.2 this camera bites.I bought two of these camera's one for me one for my daughter for christmas 2007. Big mistake although I got them at a well known retailer that had a good price on them , you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: compact digital camera
Reviews.Author: Roger B "RB"
Reviews.Content: is a very good quality camera, considering it's Sony, the definition of the pictures is excellent and with a 1GB memory, you forget, the battery has very good duration with camera on, the functions are very complete and brings the relationship between price and product is very good, I recommend it.

ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cybershot DSC-S650 7.2 MP 3x Optical Zoom Digital Camera (Silver)
